comments:
I sometimes receive this error when I try to run my ant script. The most 
frequent time I receive this is when I bring up the Ant "Modify Attributes and
Launch" dialog, then add or change a property of the ant build. When I go back
to the Targets, the list is empty. If I wait long enough (5-10 minutes?), the
targets appear again and I can run my ant build. 

I get this in my error log:
Message: Internal error occurred retrieving targets
